definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
soldier/servant/to finish/to die/finally/at last/pawn in Chinese chess
to quench/to temper/to harden by quenching

sentences.english: The structure and the feature of the tank-water quench equipment are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了巨化公司鋁廠水槽式水淬裝置的結構及其特點。

sentences.english: The higher the cooling speed, the thinner the strips are, and the lower the susceptibility of embrittlement.
sentences.chinese: 液淬速率愈高，條帶厚度愈小，其脆化敏感性愈低。

sentences.english: They are made of carbon chromium steel and are hardened and ground.
sentences.chinese: 這些內圈是碳鉻鋼製造的，並經過淬硬和研磨。

sentences.english: Another red-hot iron quenched with wine, this wine notes the medicine.
sentences.chinese: 另以鐵器燒紅淬酒，將此酒調藥服。

sentences.english: This instrument can meet the need of actual manufacture for hardness depth measurement.
sentences.chinese: 該儀器完全能滿足生產實際對淬硬層深度的測量要求。

sentences.english: It is of great influence to use rapid quenching and annealing on hydrogen storage alloys.
sentences.chinese: 快淬及退火對貯氫合金的組織和電化學性能影響很大。

sentences.english: The utilization of water quenched slag from ferromanganese blast furnace is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 深入地探討了錳鐵高爐水淬礦渣的利用。

sentences.english: The paper introduces the development of the water-quench heat treatment of oil-well tubulars by Baosteel Co.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了寶鋼油井管水淬熱處理技術的開發情況。

sentences.english: A new way of directional cooling quenching has been used to study hardenability of alloy ductile iron.
sentences.chinese: 採用一種新的端淬方法，研究了球墨鑄鐵的淬透性能。

sentences.english: The effects of polymer molecular weight and quenching temperature on the porous structure are also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 討論了聚合物分子量及淬冷溫度對成膜孔結構的影響。

sentences.english: Action is thought tempered by illusion．
sentences.chinese: 行動是被幻想淬了火的思想。

sentences.english: Some matters appeared during experiments of direct vitrification of melt copper slags were preliminarily discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 冶煉液態銅渣不經水淬直接玻化成飾面玻璃材料。

sentences.english: Vinegar turtle, a processed product using the stir-baking in sand with hot vinegar quenched.
sentences.chinese: 醋鱉甲，是採用砂燙醋淬的方法得到的生鱉甲炮製品。

definition: stars of the Big Dipper that constitute the tail of the dipper
variant of 凝練|凝练[ning2 lian4]
soul/mortal soul, i.e. attached to the body
